mapper.sql: id, seal_code, seal_name, seal_status_code, use_department_code, use_department_name, record_department_code, record_department_name, make_department_code, make_department_name, seal_type_code, materials_code, mimeograph_description, seal_shape_code, seal_size, seal_center_image, seal_specification, seal_make_type_code, seal_record_type_code,record_date,is_record,make_date,is_make,personal_date,is_personal,deliver_date ,is_deliver,logout_date,is_logout,loss_date,is_loss,remark,seal_reason,district_id
mapper.insert: insert into seal (id, seal_code, seal_name, seal_status_code, use_department_code, use_department_name, record_department_code, record_department_name, make_department_code, make_department_name, seal_type_code, materials_code, mimeograph_description, seal_shape_code, seal_size, seal_center_image, seal_specification, seal_make_type_code, seal_record_type_code,record_date,is_record,make_date,is_make,personal_date,is_personal,deliver_date ,is_deliver,logout_date,is_logout,loss_date,is_loss,remark,seal_reason,district_id ) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{materialsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mimeographDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealCenterImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{recordDate},#{isRecord},#{makeDate},#{isMake}, #{personalDate},#{isPersonal},#{deliverDate},#{isDeliver},#{logoutDate},#{isLogout},#{lossDate},#{isLoss},#{remark},#{sealReason},#{districtId})
mapper.update:
update seal
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=CHAR},
seal_code = #{record.sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seal_name = #{record.sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seal_status_code = #{record.sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
use_department_code = #{record.useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
use_department_name = #{record.useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
record_department_code = #{record.recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR},
record_department_name = #{record.recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
make_department_code = #{record.makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR},

seal_type_code = #{record.sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR},

seal_make_type_code = #{record.sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seal_record_type_code = #{record.sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update seal set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=CHAR}, seal_code = #{record.sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_name = #{record.sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_status_code = #{record.sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_code = #{record.useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_name = #{record.useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_department_code = #{record.recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, record_department_name = #{record.recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_department_code = #{record.makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, make_department_name = #{record.makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_type_code = #{record.sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, materials_code = #{record.materialsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, mimeograph_description = #{record.mimeographDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_shape_code = #{record.sealShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_size = #{record.sealSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_center_image = #{record.sealCenterImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_specification = #{record.sealSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_make_type_code = #{record.sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_record_type_code = #{record.sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update seal set seal_name = #{sealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_status_code = #{sealStatusCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_code = #{useDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, use_department_name = #{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_department_code = #{recordDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, record_department_name = #{recordDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, make_department_name = #{makeDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_type_code = #{sealTypeCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, materials_code = #{materialsCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, mimeograph_description = #{mimeographDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_shape_code = #{sealShapeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_size = #{sealSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_center_image = #{sealCenterImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_specification = #{sealSpecification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_make_type_code = #{sealMakeTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seal_record_type_code = #{sealRecordTypeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, record_date = #{recordDate}, is_record = #{isRecord}, make_date = #{makeDate}, is_make = #{isMake}, personal_date = #{personalDate}, is_personal = #{isPersonal}, deliver_date = #{deliverDate}, is_deliver = #{isDeliver}, logout_date = #{logoutDate}, is_logout = #{isLogout}, loss_date = #{lossDate}, is_loss = #{isLoss}, remark = #{remark}, seal_reason = #{sealReason}, district_id = #{districtId} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR} and seal_code = #{sealCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select * from seal WHERE use_department_code = #{useDepartmentCode} AND seal_type_code = "05" and (is_loss !=TRUE OR is_logout!=TRUE)

select operator_telphone as operatorTelphone,emplyee_name AS emplyeeName ,employee_id as employeeId,operator_name as operatorName, operator_certificate_code as operatorCertificateCode ,operator_certificate_type as operatorCertificateType ,flag as flag FROM seal_operation_record WHERE seal_code = #{sealCode} AND flag = "01";
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seal_operation_record (id, seal_code, date_time,operator_telphone,emplyee_name, employee_id, operator_name,operator_certificate_code, operator_certificate_type,flag) values (#{id}, #{sealCode}, #{dateTime}, #{operatorTelphone}, #{emplyeeName}, #{employeeId}, #{operatorName}, #{operatorCertificateCode}, #{operatorCertificateType},#{flag})
mapper.select:
SELECT `type`,file_path AS filePath FROM seal_material WHERE seal_code = #{sealCode} and `type` IN
#{type}

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 AND is_deliver =0 and is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT * from seal
is_record = 1 and is_deliver = 1 AND is_logout = 0 AND is_loss = 0
And use_department_code LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentCode}"%"
AND use_department_name LIKE "%"#{useDepartmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
AND district_id like #{districtId}"%"
AND make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT id AS id,seal_code AS sealCode,date_time AS dateTime,operator_telphone AS operatorTelphone,emplyee_name AS emplyeeName ,employee_id AS employeeId, operator_name AS operatorName, operator_certificate_code AS operatorCertificateCode ,operator_certificate_type AS operatorCertificateType, flag AS flag from seal_operation_record WHERE seal_code =#{sealCode} AND flag="01"

SELECT * FROM seal
make_department_code = #{makeDepartmentCode}
SELECT seal.make_department_code from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" group by seal.make_department_code
SELECT seal.make_department_code from seal where district_id = #{districtId} group by seal.make_department_code
SELECT seal_type_code AS sealTypeCode ,seal_code AS sealCode from seal where district_id = #{districtId}
SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss =true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id = #{districtId} AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss!=true AND is_logout=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss!=true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND is_loss=true AND is_logout!=true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
SELECT count(id) from seal where district_id like #{districtId}"%" AND seal_type_code=#{sealTypeCode} AND is_record = true AND is_make = true AND make_date BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
